=== case: no-existing-badge ===
--- before ---
# Project

Some text
--- after ---
# Project
[![blazingly fast](https://blazingly.fast/api/badge.svg?repo=proj)](https://blazingly.fast)

Some text
=== end ===

=== case: badge-above-heading ===
--- before ---
[![ci](ci)](ci)

# Project

Some text
--- after ---
[![ci](ci)](ci) [![blazingly fast](https://blazingly.fast/api/badge.svg?repo=proj)](https://blazingly.fast)

# Project

Some text
=== end ===

=== case: heading-inline-badge ===
--- before ---
# Project [![ci](ci)](ci)

Some text
--- after ---
# Project [![ci](ci)](ci) [![blazingly fast](https://blazingly.fast/api/badge.svg?repo=proj)](https://blazingly.fast)

Some text
=== end ===

=== case: single-line-badge-block ===
--- before ---
# Project

[![ci](ci)](ci)

Some text
--- after ---
# Project

[![ci](ci)](ci) [![blazingly fast](https://blazingly.fast/api/badge.svg?repo=proj)](https://blazingly.fast)

Some text
=== end ===

=== case: multi-line-badge-block ===
--- before ---
# Project

[![ci](ci)](ci)
[![cov](cov)](cov)

Some text
--- after ---
# Project

[![ci](ci)](ci)
[![cov](cov)](cov)
[![blazingly fast](https://blazingly.fast/api/badge.svg?repo=proj)](https://blazingly.fast)

Some text
=== end ===
